feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: A recent update has been made to the Bitcoin codebase through a pull request numbered 352, which has been recorded on GitHub. The update involves rebasing onto a wallet class, but no further details or explanations were given regarding its implications for the Bitcoin network. Matt Corallo announced that Wallet Encryption is now in a pull-able state after previous discussions and some results. He provided a link to the GitHub repository for interested parties to review and provide final comments or ACKs. The pull request has been rebased onto wallet class and Matt is ready for feedback.
